/>
Introduction
This topic contains information on the rating process, including
decision-making roles and responsibilities
rating a claim based on
spina bifida
, and
other covered birth defects
assigning effective dates under
38 CFR 3.814(e) and (f)
, and
38 CFR 3.815(i) and (j)
, and
reductions and discontinuances
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section D - Rating
citation: Part VIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section D
